Title: Gelsomina Verde
Writer: Roberto Saviano (idea), Roberto Saviano (novel), Giovanni Bianconi (developer), Stefano Bises (developer), Leonardo Fasoli (developer), Ludovica Rampoldi (developer), Roberto Saviano (developer), Stefano Bises (story), Stefano Bises (story), Ludovica Rampoldi (story), Ludovica Rampoldi (teleplay)
Actors: Marco D'Amore, Fortunato Cerlino, Maria Pia Calzone, Salvatore Esposito
Plot: Genny plans to lead the gang towards a bright and prosperous future, but Ciro tries to stop this by sending someone to kill Salvatore Conte's right-hand man. Genny denies responsibility, fully aware of its potentially consequences.
